description:
Dash loves to sing and dance!  
Let's clap to make Dash put on a show.

puzzles.description: Make Dash automatically turn the lights off.

hints.description: Drag out the Lights Off state. Link the state with an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After turning the lights off, make Dash play a silly sound when a clap is heard.

hints.description: Drag out the sound state. Choose something for Dash to say. Link the state with a Clap Heard cue.

puzzles.description: After the sound, make Dash instantly dance to the left.

hints.description: Drag out the Dance Left state. Link the state with an Instant cue.

puzzles.description: After dancing left, make Dash automatically turn the lights off again.

hints.description: Make a loop! Link the states with an Auto cue.
